name: bun-react-dev
postCreateCommand: apt update && apt install -y openssh-client && git config --global --add safe.directory /workspace && bun install
postStartCommand: git config --global --get-all safe.directory | grep -qx '/workspace' || git config --global --add safe.directory /workspace; mkdir -p /root/.ssh; chmod 700 /root/.ssh; if [ -f /tmp/wsl-ssh/id_ed25519 ]; then cp /tmp/wsl-ssh/id_ed25519 /root/.ssh/id_ed25519 && chmod 600 /root/.ssh/id_ed25519; fi; if [ -f /tmp/wsl-ssh/id_ed25519.pub ]; then cp /tmp/wsl-ssh/id_ed25519.pub /root/.ssh/id_ed25519.pub && chmod 644 /root/.ssh/id_ed25519.pub; fi; touch /root/.ssh/known_hosts; ssh-keyscan github.com >> /root/.ssh/known_hosts 2>/dev/null || true
